title: Everyone is gone?
content: Sometime really late last night I heard a bunch of people outside my apartment. It was suuuuper loud, like it sounded like hundreds of people yelling and talking and hitting things. It went on for a couple minutes and I just tried to ignore it and go back to sleep. I was just about to give up and go look outside when it all went so quiet. When I got to the window, there wasn't anyone in sight. It really freaked me out but I tried to go back to sleep again. My alarm woke me up at my usual time but... it's still dark outside. It looks like it's 3am outside still even though all my clocks say it's already 9:30am. I'm afraid to go outside because it's so dark and spooky but maybe it's just some daylight savings thing. I texted my parents a few minutes ago and haven't heard from anyone yet, and I don't think I've heard anyone starting their car or opening the gate all morning. I don't know what is going on but I'm really, really worried.

title: help
content: i didn't leave the house all day. the sun never came up. no one is responding to my texts or calls and i can't get any live content from the web. my phone says it's 4am now so there's been no daylight for over 24 hours. i peeked outside again because i heard footsteps but there was still no one out there. except, it was brighter than it has been. it looked like moonlight. i checked a few windows until i could see the moon. it's not right. it's... i don't know how to say this but... there are two moons, big and bright. white like eyes.
